data.title: Guns in Movies, TV and Video Games
data.text:
Timothy Dalton is a Welsh actor best known for his portrayal of James Bond in two feature films from 1987 to 1989. In addition, he has appeared in such films as The Rocketeer and Hot Fuzz and such television series as Chuck, Tales from the Crypt, and Penny Dreadful.

Timothy Dalton can be seen using the following weapons in the following films and television series:

Film

Gun Character Title Note Date Walther PPK James Bond The Living Daylights with and without suppressor 1987 Walther WA 2000 James Bond The Living Daylights AN/PVS-4 night-vision scope 1987 Beretta Cheetah James Bond The Living Daylights 1987 AK-47 James Bond The Living Daylights 1987 AKMS James Bond The Living Daylights 1987 Walther PPK James Bond Licence To Kill wood grips 1989 Taurus PT92 AF James Bond Licence To Kill 1989 Beretta 950 Jetfire James Bond Licence To Kill 1989 Walther P38 Neville Sinclair The Rocketeer 1991 M1928A1 Thompson Neville Sinclair The Rocketeer 1991 MP40 Neville Sinclair The Rocketeer 1991 Colt 1851 Navy Allan Pinkerton American Outlaws Richards-Mason conversion 2001 Heckler & Koch USP Match Simon Skinner Hot Fuzz 2007
